segment.source: How to Manage Applications in the Server Management Console
segment.target: How to Manage Applications in the Server Management Console

segment.source: How to Manage Applications in the Server Management Console
segment.target: How to Manage Applications in the Server Management Console

segment.source: How to Manage Applications in the Server Management Console
segment.target: How to Manage Applications in the Server Management Console

segment.source: From the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, you can add, remove, configure, and control all applications, for one or multiple Application Virtualization Servers.
segment.target: From the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, you can add, remove, configure, and control all applications, for one or multiple Application Virtualization Servers.

segment.source: In This Section
segment.target: In This Section

segment.source: How to Import an Application
segment.target: How to Import an Application

segment.source: Provides step-by-step instructions for importing an application by importing the Open Software Descriptor (OSD) or Sequencer Project (SPRJ) file.
segment.target: Provides step-by-step instructions for importing an application by importing the Open Software Descriptor (OSD) or Sequencer Project (SPRJ) file.

segment.source: How to Rename an Application
segment.target: How to Rename an Application

segment.source: Provides step-by-step instructions for renaming an existing application.
segment.target: Provides step-by-step instructions for renaming an existing application.

segment.source: How to Delete an Application
segment.target: How to Delete an Application

segment.source: Provides step-by-step instructions for removing or deleting an application.
segment.target: Provides step-by-step instructions for removing or deleting an application.

segment.source: How to Manually Add an Application
segment.target: How to Manually Add an Application

segment.source: Provides step-by-step instructions for manually adding an application to the servers.
segment.target: Provides step-by-step instructions for manually adding an application to the servers.

segment.source: How to Move an Application
segment.target: How to Move an Application

segment.source: Provides step-by-step instructions for moving an application from one application group to another application group.
segment.target: Provides step-by-step instructions for moving an application from one application group to another application group.

segment.source: How to Grant Access to an Application
segment.target: How to Grant Access to an Application

segment.source: Provides step-by-step instructions for giving users access permission to applications.
segment.target: Provides step-by-step instructions for giving users access permission to applications.

segment.source: How to Deny Access to an Application
segment.target: How to Deny Access to an Application

segment.source: Provides step-by-step instructions for denying users access permission to applications.
segment.target: Provides step-by-step instructions for denying users access permission to applications.

segment.source: How to Change an Application Icon
segment.target: How to Change an Application Icon

segment.source: Provides step-by-step instructions for changing the application icon.
segment.target: Provides step-by-step instructions for changing the application icon.
